text: "Please Please Me" is a 1963 song by The Beatles and is the title track to their debut studio album Please Please Me. It went to #1 in the United Kingdom, #2 in New Zealand, #3 in the United States, #4 in Italy, #5 in Canada, #7 in Sweden and #10 in Ireland. == References == == Sources == * Category:1963 songs Category:The Beatles songs Category:The Crickets songs
title: Please Please Me (song)
